name: Cauliflower Rice (Biryani-Style)
author: Ryan Feagin
summary: Indian-style cauliflower rice. Optional additions - sliced red onion, boiled egg, avocado, other biryani things.
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced, or to taste
¼ teaspoon minced fresh ginger, or to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
directions: Process cauliflower florets in a blender or food processor until broken into small pieces about the size of rice
Heat butter in a skillet over medium-high heat; add cauliflower rice, garlic, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, ginger, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper
Cook, stirring occasionally, until cauliflower is softened, about 10 minutes
Remove skillet from heat and add lime wedges and cilantro
